casebody.data:
Peter A. Morris, Respondent, v. The Manhattan Railway Co., Appellant. Decided December 30, 1886. Appeal from judgment in favor of the plaintiff, entered upon the report of a referee. Davies, Cole & Rapallo, for appellant. Charles Blandy, for respondent.

Before Sedgwick, Ch. J., Freedman and Ingraham, JJ.

Per Curiam.

The judgment appealed from should be affirmed, with costs.
